name: Mike's Flying Service
about: Mike's Flying Service, located at Terrell Municipal Airport in Texas, is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. We offer a range of training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Certificate. Our services also include aircraft rental, aerial tours, and aerial photography. With a focus on safety and personalized instruction, our FAA-certified instructors ensure that each student receives tailored training to meet their aviation goals. Whether you are a novice pilot or an experienced aviator, Mike's Flying Service is committed to helping you achieve your full potential in the skies. We pride ourselves on creating a supportive and professional learning environment, making your flight training experience both enjoyable and effective.
